verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lo! He comes from heav'n descending,
one for guilty sinners slain
Thousand, thousand saints attending,
swell the triumph of His train
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
Jesus comes and comes to reign!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
See the Saviour long expected,
Now in solemn pomp appear
And His saints by man rejected,
all His heavn'ly glory share
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
See the Son of God appear!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lo! The tokens of His passion,
Though in glory still He bears;
Cause of endless exultation,
To His ransomed worshippers.
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
Christ, the Lamb of God appears!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Israel's race shall now behold Him,
full of grace and majesty
Though they set at naught and
sold Him, pierced and nailed Him to the tree
Now in glory! Now in glory!
Shall their great Messiah see

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Tis Thy heav'nly Bride and Spirit,
Jesus, Lord, that bid Thee come
All the glory to inherit
And to take Thy people home
All creation! All creation!
Travails, groans, till Thou shalt come!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Yea, Amen! Let all adore Thee!
High on Thine exalted throne
Saviour, take the power and glory,
Claim the kingdoms for Thine own
Come, Lord Jesus! Come Lord Jesus!
Hallelujah, come Lord come!
